xal.extension.widgets.plot

Class SmartGridLimits

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.extension.widgets.plot.GridLimits
      • xal.extension.widgets.plot.SmartFormatGridLimits
        • xal.extension.widgets.plot.SmartGridLimits

  • public class SmartGridLimits
extends SmartFormatGridLimits
    This is subclass of grid limits class (SmartFormatGridLimits ) with non-empty setSmartLimitsX() and setSmartLimitsY() methods. These methods will redefine format and limits to beautify the axises markers

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class xal.extension.widgets.plot.SmartFormatGridLimits
